attributes.action: Stop The Genocide In Central Africa
attributes.additional_details:
Why is the Media focusing on trivial issues when Africans are being massacred in their thousands?

In this day and age, each and every human being has the right to practice whatever religion they choose, without fear and trepidation.

The atrocious crimes being carried out in C.Africa are unknown to many whilst the release date of the next IPhone is common knowledge. This is absurd!

UK intervention is paramount and is required  immediately. Send the Media, the troops, whoever and whatever so to stop the injustices that would not be tolerated elsewhere.

First and foremost; the media must highlight the above. Secondly, the UK government must intervene and not remain oblivious and complicit.

rejection.details: Please resubmit your e-petition focussing on action you want HM Government to take. The Government cannot influence content reported in the media.
